text: Kylie Jenner recently graced the cover of Forbes magazine as the youngest self - made billionaire and Travis Scott just dropped off his anticipated Astroworld album that is getting all the love. Aside from sharing many accomplishments due to them both killing it in their respective fields, they also share a six - month - old daughter, Stormi Webster, and reports say they are doing a great job at parenting despite their busy lifestyle. ` ` The birth of Stormi has strengthened their bond together as a couple in ways they didn't even realize were possible. Kylie and Travis are both extremely busy but are hands - on parents because they do not want to miss out on anything Stormi does,'' a source told Entertainment Tonight.
